posts.title: Introducing SonicText: AI-Powered Audio Transcription
posts.description: SonicText is an AI-powered transcription service that converts audio and video into accurate text with speaker detection, multi-language support, and AI features.
posts.author: SonicText Team

posts.title: Why Choose Sonic Text?
posts.description: SonicText delivers AI-powered, highly accurate transcriptions with fast processing, multi-language support, strong security, and flexible export options at an affordable price.
posts.author: SonicText Team

posts.title: What is Audio to Text and How Does it Work?
posts.description: AI-powered audio to text converts speech to searchable text, boosting accessibility and productivity. Factors like noise and accents impact accuracy. SonicText offers a solution.
posts.author: SonicText Team

posts.title: Share Your Transcript with Ease
posts.description: SonicText allows you to share your transcript with ease. You can share your transcript with your team, clients, or anyone you want.
posts.author: SonicText Team

posts.title: Video Transcription Launch
posts.description: SonicText now supports video transcription. You can now transcribe videos with ease.
posts.author: SonicText Team

posts.title: Cloud Storage Integration
posts.description: SonicText now supports integration with cloud storage services. You can now share files from your cloud storage services with SonicText.
posts.author: SonicText Team

posts.title: Record & Transcribe Directly from Your Browser!
posts.description: Record audio directly in your browser and get instant transcripts. Plus, new tools for splitting audio clips and downloading recordings.
posts.author: SonicText Team
